ygData.subject: Bard Epic 2.0
ygData.msgSnippet: I have been looking for infomation reguarding the new Bard Epic that is goin to be released with EQ s new Expansion OOW: and I have not been able to find
ygData.messageBody:
I have been looking for infomation reguarding the new Bard Epic that is goin to be released with EQ's new Expansion OOW: and I have not been able to find anything at all about this. I am wondering if any of you guys have been looking up the information and have been able to find something that is worth passing on ?!

Argill
Xegony
